TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit UITextDragDelegate_Extensions extends System.Object

summary.para: Extension methods to the interface to support all the methods from the protocol.

remarks.para: The extension methods for allow developers to treat instances of the interface as having all the optional methods of the original protocol. Since the interface only contains the required members, these extension methods allow developers to call the optional members of the protocol.

MemberSignature.Value: public static void DragSessionDidEnd (this UIKit.IUITextDragDelegate This, UIKit.IUITextDraggable textDraggableView, UIKit.IUIDragSession session, UIKit.UIDropOperation operation);

Docs.param: The instance on which this method operates.
The operation that ended the session.
Docs.summary: Method that is called when the user cancels or completes the drag session.
